cohort: Multiple Myeloma, RRMM, Regimen Margin Components (2024–2025)
summary: Dara-Rd regimen delivers 82% higher net margins vs. Rd due to optimal payer mix, higher reimbursement rates, and operational efficiencies despite higher drug costs.

financial_impact.math: $385,000/year = $73,000 margin difference × 35 additional patients × 15% utilization increase

clinical_impact.description: Balancing financial margins with clinical outcomes is essential for sustainable care delivery.

metrics.description: Superior PFS with Dara-Rd vs. Rd alone

peer_comparison.description: Top-performing practices achieve 8% higher net margins on Dara-Rd than your practice through optimized billing practices and improved payer contracts.

action_steps.text: Analyze top performer billing and contract strategies
Implement optimized billing workflow for Dara-based regimens
Renegotiate payer contracts for Daratumumab reimbursement
Develop waste minimization protocols for high-cost drugs
Implement waste reduction strategy for Daratumumab

suggestions.text: Optimize administration scheduling to maximize chair utilization
Evaluate dosing strategies to minimize waste
